content: looking for a fun functional and sustainable project this crochet market bag pattern is the perfect solution whether you re strolling through your favorite local farmers market or heading to the grocery store this easy market bag crochet pattern is your go-to companion **materials** ▢knit picks dishie cone worsted weight 100% cotton yarn ▢5 mm hook ▢yarn needle **abbreviations us terms ** magic_ring - magic_ring chains - chain single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch increase - increase
